item.description:
SO sorry to have to push this back again!  After a car accident, I cannot run on 5/16, so this is now bumped for 5/23.  Hopefully the track is even finshed by then!!

 

This week is National Run a Mile Days founded by the American Running Association.  The goals of the RUN A MILE event are to celebrate the mile and encourage people of all ages to participate in running the mile. NATIONAL RUN A MILE DAYS is be a festive event that promotes the message that running can be fun and is an important aspect of overall health, fitness and well-being.

In addition to our Couch to 5K event, try to push a little to see how well you can do at running a mile!  Lets see how many people we can have meet us at the track for this event!

Who can you bring along with you to get in that mile??

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: National Run a Mile Day!
